						heavy_aa_guns_hidden = 0

						not = {
							heavy_aa_guns_hidden = 1
						}
					}
					AND = {
						heavy_aa_guns = 2
						heavy_aa_guns_hidden = 1

						not = {
							heavy_aa_guns_hidden = 2
						}
					}
					AND = {
						heavy_aa_guns = 3
						heavy_aa_guns_hidden = 2

						not = {
							heavy_aa_guns_hidden = 3
						}
					}
					AND = {
						heavy_aa_guns = 4
						heavy_aa_guns_hidden = 3

						not = {
							heavy_aa_guns_hidden = 4
						}
					}
					AND = {
						heavy_aa_guns = 5
						heavy_aa_guns_hidden = 4

						not = {
							heavy_aa_guns_hidden = 5
						}
					}
					AND = {
						heavy_aa_guns = 6
						heavy_aa_guns_hidden = 5

						not = {
							heavy_aa_guns_hidden = 6
						}
					}
					AND = {
						heavy_aa_guns = 7
						heavy_aa_guns_hidden = 6

						not = {
							heavy_aa_guns_hidden = 7
						}
					}
					AND = {
						heavy_aa_guns = 8
						heavy_aa_guns_hidden = 7

						not = {
							heavy_aa_guns_hidden = 8
						}
					}
					AND = {
						heavy_aa_guns = 9
						heavy_aa_guns_hidden = 8

						not = {
							heavy_aa_guns_hidden = 9
						}
					}
					AND = {
						heavy_aa_guns = 10
						heavy_aa_guns_hidden = 9

						not = {
							heavy_aa_guns_hidden = 10
						}
					}
					AND = {
						heavy_aa_guns = 11
						heavy_aa_guns_hidden = 10

						not = {
							heavy_aa_guns_hidden = 11
						}
					}
					AND = {
						heavy_aa_guns = 12
						heavy_aa_guns_hidden = 11

						not = {
							heavy_aa_guns_hidden = 12
						}
					}
				}
			}

					AND = {

						machine_gun_doctrine_hidden = 10

						not = {
							machine_gun_doctrine_hidden = 11
						}
					}
					AND = {
						machine_gun_doctrine = 12
						machine_gun_doctrine_hidden = 11

						not = {
							machine_gun_doctrine_hidden = 12
						}
					}
				}
			}
			machine_gun_doctrine_hidden = 6000
		}

						cluster_bomb_hidden = 0

						not = {
							cluster_bomb_hidden = 1
						}
					}
				}
				cluster_bomb_hidden = 6000
			}
		}

						}
					}
					AND = {
						armor_plate_design = 4
						armor_plate_design_hidden = 3

						not = {
							armor_plate_design_hidden = 4
						}
					}
					AND = {
						armor_plate_design = 5
						armor_plate_design_hidden = 4

						not = {
							armor_plate_design_hidden = 5
						}
					}
					AND = {
						armor_plate_design = 6
						armor_plate_design_hidden = 5

						not = {
							armor_plate_design_hidden = 6
						}
					}
					AND = {
						armor_plate_design = 7
						armor_plate_design_hidden = 6

						not = {
							armor_plate_design_hidden = 7
						}
					}
					AND = {
						armor_plate_design = 8
						armor_plate_design_hidden = 7

						not = {
							armor_plate_design_hidden = 8
						}
					}
					AND = {
						armor_plate_design = 9
						armor_plate_design_hidden = 8

						not = {
							armor_plate_design_hidden = 9
						}
					}
					AND = {
						armor_plate_design = 10
						armor_plate_design_hidden = 9

						not = {
							armor_plate_design_hidden = 10
						}
					}
					AND = {
						armor_plate_design = 11
						armor_plate_design_hidden = 10

						not = {
							armor_plate_design_hidden = 11
						}
					}
					AND = {
						armor_plate_design = 12
						armor_plate_design_hidden = 11

						not = {
							armor_plate_design_hidden = 12
						}
					}
				}
			}
			armor_plate_design_hidden = 6000
		}
		# interlocked_armour
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						interlocked_armour = 1
						interlocked_armour_hidden = 0

						not = {
							interlocked_armour_hidden = 1
						}
					}
					AND = {

		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						active_sonar_sub = 1
						active_sonar_sub_hidden = 0

						not = {
							active_sonar_sub_hidden = 1
						}
					}
				}
			}
			active_sonar_sub_hidden = 6000
		}

						carrier_group_doctrine_hidden = 9

						not = {
							carrier_group_doctrine_hidden = 10
						}
					}
				}
			}
			carrier_group_doctrine_hidden = 6000
		}
		# carrier_crew_training
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						carrier_crew_training = 1
						carrier_crew_training_hidden = 0

						not = {
							carrier_crew_training_hidden = 1
						}
					}
					AND = {

		# airborne_command_and_control
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						airborne_command_and_control = 1
						airborne_command_and_control_hidden = 0

						not = {
							airborne_command_and_control_hidden = 1
						}
					}
					AND = {
						airborne_command_and_control = 2
						airborne_command_and_control_hidden = 1

						not = {
							airborne_command_and_control_hidden = 2
						}
					}
					AND = {
						airborne_command_and_control = 3
						airborne_command_and_control_hidden = 2

						not = {
							airborne_command_and_control_hidden = 3
						}
					}
					AND = {
						airborne_command_and_control = 4
						airborne_command_and_control_hidden = 3

						not = {
							airborne_command_and_control_hidden = 4
						}
					}
					AND = {
						airborne_command_and_control = 5
						airborne_command_and_control_hidden = 4

						not = {
							airborne_command_and_control_hidden = 5
						}
					}
					AND = {
						airborne_command_and_control = 6
						airborne_command_and_control_hidden = 5

						not = {
							airborne_command_and_control_hidden = 6
						}
					}
					AND = {
						airborne_command_and_control = 7
						airborne_command_and_control_hidden = 6

						not = {
							airborne_command_and_control_hidden = 7
						}
					}
					AND = {
						airborne_command_and_control = 8
						airborne_command_and_control_hidden = 7

						not = {
							airborne_command_and_control_hidden = 8
						}
					}
					AND = {
						airborne_command_and_control = 9
						airborne_command_and_control_hidden = 8

						not = {
							airborne_command_and_control_hidden = 9
						}
					}
					AND = {
						airborne_command_and_control = 10
						airborne_command_and_control_hidden = 9

						not = {
							airborne_command_and_control_hidden = 10
						}
					}
					AND = {
						airborne_command_and_control = 11
						airborne_command_and_control_hidden = 10

						not = {
							airborne_command_and_control_hidden = 11
						}
					}
					AND = {
						airborne_command_and_control = 12
						airborne_command_and_control_hidden = 11

						not = {
							airborne_command_and_control_hidden = 12
						}
					}
				}
			}
			airborne_command_and_control_hidden = 6000

						cag_design = 12

							cag_design_hidden = 12
						}
					}
				}
			}

						plane_navigation_radar_hidden = 5

						not = {
							plane_navigation_radar_hidden = 6
						}
					}
					AND = {
						plane_navigation_radar = 7
						plane_navigation_radar_hidden = 6

						not = {
							plane_navigation_radar_hidden = 7
						}
					}
					AND = {
						plane_navigation_radar = 8
						plane_navigation_radar_hidden = 7

						not = {
							plane_navigation_radar_hidden = 8
						}
					}
					AND = {
						plane_navigation_radar = 9
						plane_navigation_radar_hidden = 8

						not = {
							plane_navigation_radar_hidden = 9
						}
					}
					AND = {
						plane_navigation_radar = 10
						plane_navigation_radar_hidden = 9

						not = {
							plane_navigation_radar_hidden = 10
						}
					}
					AND = {
						plane_navigation_radar = 11
						plane_navigation_radar_hidden = 10

						not = {
							plane_navigation_radar_hidden = 11
						}
					}
					AND = {

						plane_navigation_radar_hidden = 11

						not = {
							plane_navigation_radar_hidden = 12
						}

					AND = {
						battlecruiser_class = 8
						battlecruiser_class_hidden = 7

						not = {
							battlecruiser_class_hidden = 8
						}
					}
					AND = {

						battlecruiser_class_hidden = 8

						not = {
							battlecruiser_class_hidden = 9
						}

					AND = {

						not = {
							battlecruiser_class_hidden = 10
						}
					}
				}

					AND = {
						capital_ship_heavy_anti_air_artillery = 2

						carrier_bulkheads_layout = 3
						carrier_bulkheads_layout_hidden = 2

						not = {
							carrier_bulkheads_layout_hidden = 3
						}

					AND = {

						carrier_bulkheads_layout_hidden = 4

							carrier_bulkheads_layout_hidden = 5

						carrier_bulkheads_layout_hidden = 5

						not = {
							carrier_bulkheads_layout_hidden = 6
						}

							carrier_bulkheads_layout_hidden = 7

						not = {
							jet_groundcrew_training_hidden = 7
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					AND = {
						jet_groundcrew_training = 8
						jet_groundcrew_training_hidden = 7

						not = {
							jet_groundcrew_training_hidden = 8
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					AND = {
						jet_groundcrew_training = 9
						jet_groundcrew_training_hidden = 8

						not = {
							jet_groundcrew_training_hidden = 9
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					AND = {
						jet_groundcrew_training = 10
						jet_groundcrew_training_hidden = 9

						not = {
							jet_groundcrew_training_hidden = 10
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					AND = {
						jet_groundcrew_training = 11
						jet_groundcrew_training_hidden = 10

						not = {
							jet_groundcrew_training_hidden = 11
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					AND = {
						jet_groundcrew_training = 12
						jet_groundcrew_training_hidden = 11

						not = {
							jet_groundcrew_training_hidden = 12
						}
					}
				}
			}
			jet_groundcrew_training_hidden = 6000
		}

			limit = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						jet_pilot_training = 1

			}

		add_country_modifier = {
			name = "hidden_tech_check_cooldown"
			duration = 5
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}
